column3: Hi there, can I get some help finding some fruit and vegetables?
Well, I was hoping to get some apples,  maybe a kilogram of potatoes,  and a couple of tomatoes.
Fine. We have those things. Anything else bothering you today?
Uh, no,  I don't think so. Do you have any loose mushrooms?
Look, there's a basket of pre-packaged mushrooms right there. We don't have time to weigh out every single one.
Alright, alright. I understand. How many mushrooms are in a package?
It says on the label. Can't you read?
Oh, right,  sorry.  Do you have any pears as well?
We have pears. Over in that corner.
Great. Can I just ask, are there any different varieties of pears?
Look, we have green pears and yellow pears. Happy now?
Um, yes,  thank you. I think that's all I need then.
Nothing!  Did you find everything you needed?
Yes, I believe so. Thank you for your... assistance.
No problem. Now, if you'll excuse me,  the next customer...
